root.name: Banana Prince
root.description: StoryAs an Island Native the Banana Prince is on a quest to retrieve the stolen weapons of the island, along the way he'll pick up companions and even appear on a game show, through which he can win back the treasures of the island. Like Jack and the Beanstalk, he has with him a bag of seeds that allows him to grow a flower and climb it. There are also hidden platforms, and doors that can only be reached by collecting flower tokens (which allow him to grow a bigger flower).
